text: (nabiye! edinadi) malayikavarun tamange deviyanta prasamsa kara suvisuddha karamin, ars vata vata karagena sitinu oba dakinnehiya. e atara ovun atare sadharana lesatama viniscaya karanu læbe. “lokavasin siyallanvama utpadanaya kara, posanaya kara, samraksanaya karamin sitina allahtama siyalu prasamsa ayat ve” yayi (siyallan visin suvisuddha kara, prasamsa kara) pavasanu læbe
